reviews.comments: El depasrtamento es muy moderno, muy bien decorado y completo. Aparte tiene pileta de natación, Muy lindo. Recomiendo 100 x 100.

El departamento está hermoso. Muy cómodo y con todo lo necesario. La ubicación es buena, pero solo si vas a san telmo, la boca, madero. El resto está bastante lejos y de noche no da mucha seguridad caminar por allí. De día está lleno de gente, en especial turistas recorriendo las callecitas de san telmo.
Muy Buena atencion.. ubicacion y tal  cual lo ves  en las fotos
Muy bueno todo en gral , altamente recomendable
Muy recomendable, el depto es muy lindo, cómodo, espacioso y muy bien ubicado, en una zona del barrio que se siente segura.
Una Maravilla
Exelente Lugar, atencion y ubicación.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias German ! te esperamos cuando gustes

reviews.comments: Excelente
Perfecta estadía en Buenos Aires. Muy buen sistema el de Airbnb. Y excelente departamento en el que nos alojamos.
Excelente, igual a las fotos

Toda la estadia estuvo impecable, desde que llegamos hasta la partida. El departamento tal cual son las fotos y el servicio impecable. Muy recomendable para los que esten en duda. Nos volveremos a alojar la proxima vez que viajemos a Bs As.
Muy lindo lugar, es todo lo que aparece en la publicación. y una predisposición excepcional por parte del host.
Muy cómodo y tal cual se ve en las fotos. Muy linda zona de Buenos Aires. Muy amables recepcionistas, siempre dispuestos a dar una mano.
Realmente todo muy bueno, excelente la estadía y el trato muy cordial. El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Sin duda volvería!!!

No pude conocer al anfitrión, pero me recibio en la entrada una recepcionistas, Alejandra, quien me dio las llaves y me hizo el check in. Todo como en las imagenes, muy buena atención. Muy cómodo. El barrio es uno de los mas visitados por los turistas y con mucho movimiento.

Pasamos un fin de semana excelente. El lugar es tal cual el anuncio! Es muy cálido, limpio y luminoso.
Las chicas de Recepcion nos indicaron muy bien direcciones y fueron muy amables. 
En cuanto al barrio súper pintoresco y con muchas actividades para realizar. 
Recomendamos al 100% :)
Un barrio muy tranquilo y lindo para salir a pasear, la habitación es muy cómoda y el trato es genial! :)

Muy lindo el apartamento y el edificio en general, ideal para estadías en pareja o por trabajo. El apartamento está a dos cuadras del corazón de San Telmo, y rodeada de cafés y bares bohemios y antiguos... Muy cómodo, muy lindo y bien ubicado.
reviews.response: Muchas Gracias Juan. Nos alegra que disfrutaras tu estadía. Saludos.

reviews.comments: La habitación era limpia y cómoda. Los cojines se veían algo manchados. Pero en general el sitio me pareció confortable y bonito.
Buenísima atención, hermoso lugar. Volveríamos sin duda!
Excelente lugar para hospedarse en Buenos Aires, gran ubicación

La estancia fue genial. La perdona que me atendió en la recepción fue muy amable y de mucha ayuda.
El departamento esta en muy buen sitio, San Telmo, lo cual a mi se me hizo tipo hipster y muy cómodo.
Hay varios restaurantes y bares muy a gusto a su alrededor y lo mejor de todo es que esta a una media hora caminando a La Recoleta y varios lugares mas. También está muy bien situado para tomar el subte a cualquier lado. 
El departamento estuvo muy cómodo y limpio. Bastante recomendable.

Excelente apartamento tal y como se ve en las fotos, ubicado cerca de muchos restaurantes en una zona segura, se ven uno que otro indigente en la calle pero nada que preocuparse
Tienen una piscina y área de estar preciosa.
El apartamento es muy espacioso y la cama es grande 
Sin duda alguna volvería

Muy buena ubicación, todo limpio y moderno como en las fotos. Los cuartos súper amplios y distribuidos para una estancia cómoda. La cocina equipada. El servicio en la entrada rápido y amable, me volvería a quedar ahí.

El lugar se ve exactamente como se ve en las fotos, muy limpio y ameno. La habitacion esta muy iluminado lo que me parecio perfecto. En general el servicio bueno. Lo único es que no tuve una buena experiencia en el trayecto del aeropuerto al departamento, primero porque no venia la direccion exacta al darle click en airbnb para las instrucciones de (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) maps solo me mando a la zona y segundo porque el taxista creo que se quiso aprovechar de que era turista. Despues me contactaron para pasarme la ubicacion en el mapa y porfin pude llegar!
Una experiencia genial. Han sido muy amables y atentos en todo.
Excelente.     Tal cual las fotos. Y bien ubicado

Bonito departamento, cómodo y con todo lo que se necesita para estar unos días en BAires. Está cerca de varios restaurantes muy buenos. La gente de la administración fueron super amables. Muy bien todo!
Muy buen alojamiento, tal como se ve en las fotos. Todo muy cómodo y buena calefacción. La atención del personal es muy amable. La zona la sentí tranquila y es muy bonita, ideal para salir a caminar.
Depto muy cómodo y limpio. Sin problemas.  Very clean and comfortable apartment. No problems.

El departamento súper acogedor, luminoso y moderno está en el centro de San Telmo. Para poder movilizarse a otros lugares lo ideal es tomar taxi. Esta también cerca a Puerto Madero ideal para caminar,almorzar y cenar.
John muy atento y respondiendo siempre rápido.
Todo excelente como siempre!
El apartamento es muy lindo y cómodo, tal cual como se ve en la foto. La atención es muy buena, llegamos en la noche y nos fuimos temprano en la mañana y siempre estuvieron para ayudarnos.

Una muy buena experiencia de hospedaje. La habitación es tal como se ve en la imagen, la cual consta con una decoracion moderna y confortable para una estadia agradable.
La piscina del apartamento se vuelve un plus importante para pasar las tardes calurosas de Buenos Aires. Tambien cabe mensionar que la atención de sus recepcionistas y el mantenimiento de las habitaciones es siempre óptimo.
Good experience
Très agréable petit hôtel, chambre spacieuse avec canapé et cuisine (et salle de bain). Lumineux, calme, bien situé. Impeccable !

EXCELENTE
COMODO, SIMPLE, PRACTICO

Excelente! Eu e minha noiva ficamos encantados com o lugar e com toda a equipe. Foram todos muito prestativos e nos ajudaram com tudo que precisamos. O lugar é lindo e muito bem cuidado. Quando voltar a Buenos Aires certamente me hospedarei aqui novamente.
It is a quite, really nice place in the middle of the pretty San Telmo barrio! Everything you need is close!

Very clean and quiet place in the heart of San Telmo. Check-in was painless even though our flight was significantly delayed (24-hour desk) and the staff was exceptional. Very kind and there for whatever you needed. Would definitely recommend!

Incredible stay! The space was stylish and VERY clean. It felt very safe. The reception was outstanding, and the free coffee/tea certainly didn't hurt. I will definitely recommend this to my friends and family.
Great location, clean, comfortable.
The apartment was lovely and was right in the middle of San Telmo. We had a great stay and would definitely recommend this place in Buenos Aires.

Lemon Apartments, not to be mistaken with the Lemon Hostel next door, is very quaint, personalized, clean, stylish, I could go on! It was, as another reviewer said, an "oasis" in the middle of all the hustle and bustle of San Telmo. The location was perfect! It was such a nice touch having an airbnb with a CONCIERGE! The ladies were all so helpful and accommodating. I cannot say enough amazing things about this place!
Our fourth stay at Lemon Apartments. Highly recommended for a well located clean, modern self catering.

This is our third stay at Lemon Apartments in San Telmo and we have booked a fourth stay.  It's new, spotlessly clean and has everything we need.  The location is perfect in San Telmo.  Friendly staff make it a pleasure to return.

This place was like it's own mini oasis in the middle of San Telmo. From the outside you may easily walk past it but once you get inside it is all modern and has a great little cafe and pool for communal use on the first floor. There is also an elevator in case you have bags that aren't easily carried up and down the stairs. 

The bed was great and easily fit a 6'3" guy. The small kitchenet has everything you need to cook if you so choose. The bathroom was bigger than most bathrooms we had seen for Buenos Aires and came fully stocked with towels and soaps. There were plenty of plugs around the room and a full length mirror in the livingroom enabled you to get ready in the morning while someone was in the bathroom. 

The front desk is very friendly and will even help you with directions and book dinner reservations. If you arrive early before check in or have a later flight they will let you store your bags in the lobby.

Internet speed was great and A/C unit worked just fine. This place was recommended by a friend and I would for sure stay here again!

Clean, contemporary apartment in the heart of San Telmo, the oldest section of the city of Buenos Aires. The front desk service clerks were always friendly and helpful. There's lots to explore in the area although it can also be noisy and a challenge sometimes to sort out some of the narrow, badly kept sidewalks. Comfortable shoes are recommended, and if you don't mind long walks, you can access most landmarks in the city from this location. Access to public transportation is also very easy.

Excelente experiência!
Espaço amplo e de bom gosto.
O sol da manhã e o silencio deram um toque especial.
Super recomendo!
Great place, clean and modern, perfectly located in San Telmo.
La réception a bien été, nous avons pu être conseillés pour nos déplacements le studio était propre et moderne, nous avons apprécié notre séjour et recommandons l'endroi.

Of all the Airbnb properties I have stayed at, this was the best.  The attention is personal and friendly, the rooms are huge and modern, and everything about the place makes me want to come back.  Thank you Rob and Daniel and all the rest of the team.
reviews.response: Thank so much August! It was very nice to host you! We'll be looking forward to receive you again! Regards.

reviews.comments: Excelente o lugar, limpo, tudo novo, e muito confortável.
Beautiful room in the heart of San Telmo. Highly recommend!
reviews.response: Thanks for your comment Sarah And Michaela! We'll be pleased to have you again as a guest! Regards.

reviews.comments: great. clean. economical. fun neighborhood.
Espaço ótimo, limpeza e atendimento nota mil, tudo impecável

Great locatiob to experuence Argentinian downtown life away from a tourist context. It takes about 30 min to walk to city centre. It is a flat walk or taxi ride is easy and affordable. It is a first class modern property in an old area. Property is very secure. There is a little bit of night noise but not excessive.  24 hour reception is obliging and helpful.  Room is very spacious. Bathroom very good.

The room we rented was incredibly spacious, modern, and incredibly comfortable. Check-in was very easy, staff was very friendly, and couldn't have asked for better accommodations. The bed was really comfortable and we loved being just a few blocks away from great restaurants and bars in San Telmo. Would definitely recommend staying here to friends and family!

It's the third time that we stay at Lemon, and we highly recommend it!
The place is very well located, clean, nice and modern, and the staff is absolutely great! helpful, polite...
It's become our pied a terre in Buenos Aires!

Séjour parfait dans ce studio parfaitement situé à San Telmo , proche du marché et de la place Dorrego où on peut voir des couples danser le tango vers 17 h. 
C est en fait un appart hôtel avec un service de gardien
nage , on se sent en sécurité. 
Les gardiens sont des jeunes tres aimables , parlant anglais 
À noter café Et the à profusion dans le salon attenant à une petite piscine. Je recommande vivement.
Beautiful apartment in a great location! Would definitely stay again!
Like always, amazing stay that makes me feel home in the heart of San Telmo. What else could I ask?

Incrível! Lugar encantador. 5 estrelas. Melhor que as fotos. Seguro, acessível, prático. Porteiro sempre disposto a ajudar. Amamos o lugar e será impossível voltar a Buenos Aires e não ficar no Lemon.

Great stay!
Highly recommended
Great place, will love to come back soon.
Great place.
We loved the easiness to walk to downtown, and most of all we liked the friendly and helpful staff of this place. The only think I would ask the host is to thicken the glass doors on the street side.

Very central in San Telmo...only 3 short blocks from Dorreho plaza where the famed fair takes place every Sunday. Friendly neighborhood. The apartment is quiet, modern, clean with good A/C. Comfortable king bed. Reception attentive. Nice small pool and common area with tea and coffee available 24hrs. John was very responsive.
Good value.
The apartment was very tidy, reception people speak great English and happy the help you with all your problems. Great location and the place I definitely will come back to.
Great place, comfortable, modern and relaxing. The process was painless and the staff are very kind and helpful.
Great apartment in the centre of SanTelmo one of the busy tourist districts - plenty of restaurants and supermarkets just around the corner and an awesome beer bar too!

Ensemble de petits studios.  Bon séjours.  Pied à terre à recommander pour explorer BA.  Seul petit point négatif L'hostel voisin peut être un peu bruyant ainsi que la piscine . Mais dans l'ensemble j'y retournerais et j'ai été déçu de ne pas pouvoir prolonger mon séjour de 2 jours l'appartement étant déjà réservé
Very nice clean well appointed studio apartment in an interesting area. Only improvement I would suggest is a coffe maker would have been useful.

Expérience à Fort Pierce désastreuse 
Ici à Buenos Aires nous avons été ravies

One of a bunch of apartments in a well-located building in San Telmo. Easy check in and check out at any hour with 24 hour front desk. Fairly comfortable bed, clean room, nice shower. Wifi was a little spotty/inconsistent but otherwise a great base for exploring B.A.
Excelent place. Real clean and with nice people. Real modern and cozy room. Definitely recommend
Accurate listing, nice building in a fun part of town.
Stylish and well presented accomodation. Great location and very helpful staff and host. Highly recommended.

The place is fantastic!!! Great location, great design, clean, comfortable, amazing bed!!!!
The staff was extremely helpful!
I totally recommend it as the perfect pied a terre to discover BA!
We will be back for sure!
Quartier sympa. Pas envahi de touristes. Tout bien. Rien d autre a dire. C est parfait.
Nice, clean, safe and pleasant place! cordial people at the reception. it was easy all around!

Stayed here for two nights and it was really great - the street doesn't look like anything special but you are very close to the main area of San Telmo and the market so it was really great. 

The apartment was really nice and bright and very clean, modern - just like the pictures! Felt very nice hanging out there and there was lots of space. 

They also helped us arrange transfers to/from the main airport so that was really useful!!    :) 

Would definitely recommend if you want to stay in this part of town!

Where do I start? Is was the best experience in Buenos Aires John took care of us like we where his family.
-
5 STAR COSTUMER SERVICE :)
Très bel appartement bien placé à San Telmo, Il est possible de laisser ses bagages à la réception.
Awesome apartment!

For our last two nights in Buenos Aires, my boyfriend and I decided to spend our last two nights in the San telmo area. 

This apartment was so clean and  felt more like a hotel. 24 hour check in security, beautiful amenities and a balcony!

Definitely would stay here again. Quick and easy checkin process and the perfect size studio for all of our luggage.

The rooms are very elegant, clean, and we'll kept. All the advantages of a hotel, but the privacy of your own space and access. Only negative is that my room faced the street, which can be quite noisy.

We enjoyed our stay at lemon, check in an out was easy, there are a couple of interesting restaurants in walking distance. At night (Saturday) it can get a little noisy on the street outside. Overall we can recommend this accommodation to other travelers.
great place! beautiful and modern. Clean. easy to communicate with ! wished we had stayed there our entire time
The apartment was fantastic and very clean. Located in a great location to explore Buenos Aires. Everyone there was very friendly and helpful. Couldn't fault the set up, fantastic thank you.

John foi super atencioso desde meu primeiro contato.

O apartamento é igual ao anunciado (talvez melhor ao vivo). Super limpo, moveis novos, completo e pronto para uso. 

Todos os funcionários são super prestativos, indicaria a estadia a todos que se interessarem!

Tres bon logement bien situé
chambre grande et agréable.
conforme aux photos
Nice place and good location in the historical center of Buenos Aires.
Great place to stay in the heart of San Telmo! Super clean and efficient. Recommendable.
Ótima localização e com um apartamento bem equipado. Ficamos hospedados por 5 noites e o pessoal foi muito receptivo. Indicaria a amigos e também voltaria a me hospedar em outras viagens .

Ótimo flat...muito moderno...tudo novo...limpeza impecável. ...atendimento excelente. .. quarto exatamente como aparece nas fotos...ótima acolhida dos funcionários. ..especialmente do Samuel...que nos atendeu em português e nos deu todas as dicas de Buenos Aires. ..e a localização no charmoso bairro de San Telmo é perfeita, cheia de bares, padarias e restaurantes excelentes e para todos os bolsos.

Nossa experiência foi incrível. O apartamento é super aconchegante, tinha tudo que precisávamos e mais um pouco. A cozinha é equipada (não usamos, mas tem de tudo para quem quiser cozinhar), tinha mesas e cadeiras, e uma vista linda com flores na varanda. Apesar do hotel não oferecer café da manhã, caminhávamos até a lanchonete da esquina para comer deliciosas medialunas. A localização é ótima, perto de bares e restaurantes e pontos turísticos. O metrô também fica próximo. Gostamos muito da recepção, quem nos recebeu era brasileiro e ficou fácil de tirar várias dúvidas sobre a cidade. Amamos tudo.
Nice apartments in the heart of San Telmo. The neighborhood is safe, also by night, and offers lots of bars and restaurants near by. Recommend to stay there.
It was fine. Good communication, lots of advice, convenient location.

Apartment was as described, spacious, clean, and comfortable. The street noise can get a bit loud at times, so if you're a light sleeper, may want some earplugs. More like a boutique hotel than a true apartment. But I really liked the space
